edu.cs495.engine.input

Class MouseKeyboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.input.MouseKeyboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Input, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MouseKeyboard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Input, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener
    The mouse and keyboard input listener interface
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau
